|area_land_sq_mi = 13.44 |area_water_sq_mi = 0.05 }} Lithia Springs () is a census-designated place and unincorporated area, formerly incorporated as a city, located in northeastern Douglas County, Georgia, United States. As of the 2020 U.S. Census, the community had a population of 16,644. ==References== Category:Census-designated places in Georgia (U.S. state)
